com.ushahidi.java.sdk.net

Class BaseUshahidiHttpClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ushahidi.java.sdk.net.BaseUshahidiHttpClient
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    UshahidiHttpClient

    public abstract class BaseUshahidiHttpClient
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a custom implementation of an HTTP client based on the existing classes provided by the standard java.net package.

    It implements both POST and GET requests. In addition it supports multi-part POST request to allow file uploads.

    Author:
    eyedol
